name: Next GRT - KW地区公交小助手
tagline: next grt, iphone, ios, waterloo, kitchener, cambridge,  KW地区, 公交
body:
# Next GRT is the only bilingual bus assistant for KW Region
### Main Features
* List bus stops around you
* Show next arrival time for each bus route
* Mark any stop as a favorite and you can give it a nickname
* More features developing...

![img1](http://a3.mzstatic.com/us/r1000/068/Purple/v4/c3/f7/c8/c3f7c892-9f11-d195-6123-189d6ac622db/mzl.bsnxkmzz.320x480-75.jpg)
